Even though I reach to hotel at 8:30 am, I could check-in at 10 am as the hotel staff arrange for me as soon as possible. It is not difficult to communicate, as the staff are able to speak English well. The room is quite big, including balcony. I was also worried about hygiene as the price is quite low, but you don't have to worry about it because the hygiene was OK. The daily room make-up was also good and fast. They provide the pick-up service and offer the sending service if you want. Even though the location is the best, it is not noisy at all. On the other hand, you should visit 'River Cafe' becaus

Even though I reach to hotel at 8:30 am, I could check-in at 10 am as the hotel staff arrange for me as soon as possible. It is not difficult to communicate, as the staff are able to speak English well. The room is quite big, including balcony. I was also worried about hygiene as the price is quite low, but you don't have to worry about it because the hygiene was OK. The daily room make-up was also good and fast. There is no staff who can speak Korean.
There are too many cockroaches in the bathroom.
The air conditioner is too old and the sound is too loud to fall asleep.
I said it was a city view but I can't see anything.
After paying 3 nights, I moved to another hotel after 1 night.
Free breakfast and no food, mostly empty dishes.
This is a really disappointing hotel.

title: Terribly unkind unkind,  dirty dirty,β€
content:
Receotion was arrogant and unkind. I just asked information for travel and paid breakfast. That,s all. But she was not simply unkind, evrn hostile. Staring at me just like looking at enemy. Frightening. Hard too understand.  Could not ask any more. Even gave wrong information. Even  I used private room,  only one small towel privided, the freezer and wall very dirty, when sleeping felt itch, bed bug. Worst hotel I ve experienced.

title: Comfort and cleannessβ€
content:
I liked the seaview room that we got on the 2nd floor. The bed is big and very comfortable. 

Everything is pretty clean, however there's water leak on the toilet floor after showing. 
Some more details like numbers to call the front desk and menu of the mini are missing. 

After all we enjoyed our stay here π

title: Disappointed.β€
content: The room doesn't the same as the picture shown.

title: Lovely staff, tired hotel β€
content:
We had one night here due to an early flight meaning we had to leave Koh Rong the day before. 
The staff were incredibly helpful but the hotel was very tired, there were ants everywhere including coming out of plug sockets in the room and on the food at breakfast. This area of Sihanoukville has obviously seen better days and there is very little around. 
Staff were lovely though!

content: Need to be renovated and improve the service

title: Remote location, clean roomβ€
content:
We were satisfied with services in the resort but only its location. It is difficukt to get there if you follow the google map. Just get to the Kampot town and then go to the resort, it is better and saving time even little farther in its distance. 
Able to enjoy free kayaking as well although not long.

title: Remote location, clean roomβ€
content:
We were satisfied with services in the resort but only its location. It is difficukt to get there if you follow the google map. Just get to the Kampot town and then go to the resort, it is better and saving time even little farther in its distance. 
Able to enjoy free kayaking as well although not long.

title: cozy but restricted to access to town β€
content: It was very nice, however, there was a local water park opposite side of the hotel, they played music loudly. It was quite noisy during day time.  Also, it was quite hard to access to town, we needed to pay almost 10$ per one way. Except for that,  overall it was good.

title: Overall good β€
content: Sheets are clean but have marks of cigarettes burning. Airconditioning worked well. No tv in the room. The only downside is when you book through Agoda they tend to put you on 3rd floor which is a hassle π­ to climb.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: All greatβ€
content: Great location (80 meters from bus).  Great food.  Great staff.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: It's ok for 1-2 nightsβ€
content: Very basic room not even a chair in the room. It's ok for 1-2 nights. There are cheaper places with more comfortable rooms. They charge more for rooms with city view but the window only shows a building under construction.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Budget accommodation in great locationβ€
content: Don't eat the seafood dishes. Apart from that it was OK.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Charming simple guesthouse in the riverβ€
content:
Spacious room and simple layout. 
Great little bar/restaurant in the entrance.
On the riverside and in the centre of the town near all things food and drink related.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: great locationβ€
content: Good Morning Kampot is a no-frills hotel, but it has a great location by the river and amidst the cafe/restaurant area, and has a very friendly staff too.

title: μµκ³ β€

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good value β€
content: Nice hostel, would definitely stay again (especially since they have tiny kittens!) Offer good value drinks downstairs and good wine.  Friendly staff, comfy bed.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Awesome Value Riversideβ€
content:
booked this place last minute and  extended our stay a bit, would recommend in a heartbeat for traveling on a budget.

roof top bar is great for a romantic sunset. chill vibes. 

100.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Nice locationβ€
content: Good value for money. Located right across from the river and loads of good restaurants within 5 minute walk. Room had good hot water. Faults maybe  - no window, no tv, no fridge, but it didn't bother me as I didn't spend much time in my room. I will come back again.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Cheap, comfy, good viewβ€
content: The staff is sooo friendly. Had a very good stay. Chilled every evening on the balcony with river view.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Second hotel I stayed in kampot. By far the bestβ€
content: All the staff were friendly, located across street from river. Very laidback bar on roof with pool table and great night view of lighted river boats. I loved it. Also good food.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Stay away at all cost !β€
content: Arraived and found out my passport was missing. The man in reception found that amusing and refused to let me check in. Also offer no help at all for a man in need. No advice, no offer phone for call, just standing there smiling at the angry person that needed help. Stay away from this place so it  get closed. Hope nobody books here. The passport was not needed for my next place and they helped me with phone and all, totally opposite of the bad people that work at Good Morning Kampot. NOT RECOMENDED !

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: My room was unfit for livingβ€
content: I was a repeat customer and had planned to stay several nights but everything was so bad I left after 1 night. There was no pleasant greeting when I arrived. Just β€what do you wantβ€.  When booking I requested a quiet room on upper level. The hotel wasnβ€™t busy so it shouldnβ€™t have been a problem. But I got 1st floor top of the stairs! Staff just to lazy to take me to a higher floor I guess. The room was utterly disgusting. Smelt terrible. Walls covered in mould. The wall was actually damp! Hole in The  bathroom ceiling where there had been a big leak. The bed had hairs in it. Not comfortable, no blanket, just a sheet. No bottled water supplied. Bathroom was filthy so I didnβ€™t even feel comfortable to shower here. In the morning I had a headache and sore eyes from this room. Yuk! Oh and please note the rooms do not have televisions.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Well located but ... β€
content: The hotel is well located but kind of dirty. They ask you to take off your shoes when you come in, but then your feet are black because the floor is so dirty. Also, we think our room wasnβ€™t cleaned before we got in. The sheet werenβ€™t changed, there were hair in there. The staff changed the sheet when we asked, but the floor was also dirty so was the bathroom. Also, some of the staff was really nice, but some was rude. Like we were disturbing them when we had a question. So if you pay 10-15$ I guess itβ€™ ok, but more than that... nope.
